attributes.action: Say no to Calais to enter the United Kingdom illegally.
attributes.background: There are people born in the U.K who can't get homes. Our NHS is full to capacity our schools and GP surgeries are overcrowded so much Britain is full of immigrations. We cannot afford to keep them in anymore.So guys lets step up and save Britain by saying no to Syria immigrations to enter in uk.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107137

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
